result.eng: She kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ga: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.orig: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.html: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ponchtml: Lean sí ag gearán léi go ḃfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.

result.eng: I kept that pile of papers in the corner of my table.
result.ga: Choinnigh mé an ceap páipéir sin ar chúinne an bhoird
result.orig: Choinnigh mé an ceap páipéir sin ar chúinne an bhoird
result.html: Choinnigh mé an ceap páipéir sin ar chúinne an bhoirdI kept that pile of papers in the corner of my table.
result.ponchtml: Ċoinniġ mé an ceap páipéir sin ar ċúinne an ḃoirdI kept that pile of papers in the corner of my table.

result.eng: And the bad news just kept on coming.
result.html: Agus níor stopadh den drochnuachtAnd the bad news just kept on coming.
result.ponchtml: Agus níor stopaḋ den droċnuaċtAnd the bad news just kept on coming.
